snippet: The European Central Bank’s move to revive the euro zone economy helped lift the Dow and S.&P. 500 to nominal highs.
abstract: Markets rise broadly as European Central Bank takes steps to revive the euro zone's flagging economy; gains push Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index and the Dow Jones industrial average to new nominal highs.
lead_paragraph: The European Central Bank’s move to revive the euro zone economy helped lift the Dow and S.&P. 500 to nominal highs.

headline.main: European Bank’s Rate Cuts Push the Markets Upward
headline.print_headline: European Bank’s Rate Cuts Push the Markets Upward
